name: Sacrimatch3
description:
Sacrimatch3 is my entry for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022, with the theme : DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

You start with a party of cultists who want to explore a crypt. In order to go through solid walls, they have to sacrifice themselves and in their death summon a door with a strange mechanism where they have to match runes to materialize it.

Each cultist has a limited amount of actions and the party might need to perform multiple sacrifices in order to get through. But who will make it through ?

Git repository : https://github.com/ffortat/sacrimatch3
